name: Reagrow
description:
Join Rea on a little adventure! It seems like this part of the forest has some sort of pest problem, but not to worry! Just a spin or two and the forest will be back to it's peaceful, beautiful self.

Arrows to move, Space to jump, 'z' to spin.

---------------------------------------------

View other Mediocre Production games here: https://g-fish.itch.io/mediprogames

(Page permalink): https://g-fish.itch.io/reagrow

---------------------------------------------

Background Music by FoolBoyMedia
Titlescreen Ambience by InspectorJ
Titlescreen Start by fins
Extra Level Music by Mrthenoronha
Rea Jumping sound by LloydEvans09
Rea Spinning sound by Nick Judy
Enemy Sounds by iSaria
Magic Wand sound by qubodup
Punch by thefsoundman
Portal Sound by outroelison
